About Me

Let me tell you a little about me and my work

“If You Always Do What You’ve Always Done, You’ll Always Get What You’ve Always Got.” ~ said Henry Ford and i live this sentence! after my studies of electrical engineering and information technology at the leibniz university hannover i started to work as a programmer in the field of automation. but after one year i realized that i have a great interest in web development, so i started to improve my programming knowledge in this field. after almost a year i am able to develop the responsive website with the sophisticated features easily. You can find some of them in this portfolio under the title Work.
